handNote.p: The hand writing the Life of Malchus (182.02c) and the Letter of Wynfrith to Eadburga in the same MS. Long s is exclusive in the minuscule character set, with the possibly exception of 146v2. The e in the ge-prefix is often abbreviated. s-shaped macron in abbreviations. Dotted ẏ common.
